tool.name: Absolute Binding Free Energy
tool.description: Absolute binding free energy simulations using Yank
tool.command: ln -s '$yank_inp' ./yank_input.yaml && ln -s '$proin' ./protein.pdb && ln -s '$ligin' ./ligand.mol2 && #if $input_fep == 'perform': yank script --yaml=yank_input.yaml &>> '$report' && tar cf experiments.tar experiments / #end if #if $input_fep == 'generate': mkdir -p input_files && cp ./yank_input.yaml input_files/ && cp ./protein.pdb input_files/ && cp ./ligand.mol2 input_files/ && tar cf input_files.tar input_files/ #end if

configfiles.configfile:
options: platform: $platform minimize: yes verbose: yes resume_setup: yes resume_simulation: yes output_dir: . #if $equil == "yes": default_nsteps_per_iteration: $equil.eq_tstep default_number_of_iterations: $equil.eq_iter #end if temperature: $temperature *kelvin default_timestep: $tstep *femtosecond #if $ensemble == "npt": pressure: $ensemble.pressure *atmosphere #end if #if $ensemble == "nvt": pressure: null #end if
#if $method == "mcmc": mcmc_moves: langevin: type: LangevinSplittingDynamicsMove n_steps: $steps timestep: $tstep *femtosecond collision_rate: 1.0/picosecond reassign_velocities: no splitting: 'V R O R V' n_restart_attempts: 6
samplers: repex: type: ReplicaExchangeSampler mcmc_moves: langevin number_of_iterations: $iter #end if
solvents: pme: nonbonded_method: PME nonbonded_cutoff: 11*angstroms ewald_error_tolerance: 1.0e-4 clearance: 12*angstroms positive_ion: Na+ negative_ion: Cl- ionic_strength: 100*millimolar solvent_model: $water leap: parameters: [leaprc.water.$water]
molecules: protein: filepath: protein.pdb ligand: filepath: ligand.mol2 antechamber: charge_method: bcc
systems: protein-ligand: receptor: protein ligand: ligand solvent: pme leap: parameters: [leaprc.protein.$pro_ff, leaprc.$lig_ff, leaprc.water.$water]
protocols: absolute-binding: complex: alchemical_path: lambda_electrostatics: [$coul] lambda_sterics: [$steric] lambda_restraints: [$rest] solvent: alchemical_path: lambda_electrostatics: [$coul] lambda_sterics: [$steric]
experiments: system: protein-ligand protocol: absolute-binding #if $method == "mcmc": sampler: repex #end if restraint: type: $restraints

param.name: eq_iter
param.label: Number of iterations used for equilibration

param.name: platform
param.label: Select the OpenMM platform used to run the calculations

param.name: coul
param.label: Lambda electrostatics
param.help: Values must be between 0 and 1 and , separated.

param.name: steric
param.label: Lambda sterics
param.help: Values must be between 0 and 1 and , separated.

param.name: rest
param.label: Lambda restraints
param.help: Values must be between 0 and 1 and , separated.

param.name: input_fep
param.label: Perform simulation or only generate input files?

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
Calculate the absolute binding free energy of protein-ligand binding.
_____
.. class:: infomark
**Input**
- Protein structure (PDB) file - Ligand structure (MOL2) file
_____
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
- Results from the experiment (experiments.tar) - Output log file (Report)
or
- Input files
